content.text: Match ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 5, KAA Gent 0.
Second Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 5, KAA Gent 0.
Foul by Rabiu (KAA Gent).
Maksim Malyshev (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Darijo Srna (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Moses Simon (KAA Gent).
Offside, KAA Gent. Thomas Foket tries a through ball, but Brecht Dejaegere is caught offside.
Eduardo da Silva (Shakhtar Donetsk) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Nana Asare (KAA Gent) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eduardo da Silva (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Attempt saved. Marlos (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Darijo Srna.
Foul by Maksim Malyshev (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Nana Asare (KAA Gent) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Taison (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Eduardo da Silva.
Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 5, KAA Gent 0. Maksim Malyshev (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marlos with a through ball.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar Donetsk) because of an injury.

Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Taison replaces Bernard.
Attempt missed. Dentinho (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left.

Substitution, KAA Gent. Kalifa Coulibaly replaces Jérémy Perbet.
